hero.title: Welcome to Our Website
hero.subtitle: Discover events, connect with people, and stay informed
hero.subtitle1: SUP training sessions for military personnel
hero.subtitle2: This is more than just sport — it's a place where everyone feels the support of those beside them

about.title: Fortis Unitas
about.description: A veteran organization providing free SUP training sessions for military personnel in Kyiv on the Desenka River This is more than just sport — it’s a space for support, rehabilitation, and community on the water

info.title: About the Organization
info.description: We are the veteran organization Fortis Unitas, offering free weekly SUP training sessions on the Desenka River for veterans and active military personnel With the support of SUP Kayak Club '4 Storony', we’ve created a space for rehabilitation, recovery, and community Regardless of your physical shape — you’re welcome We train all year round, share coffee after the water, and support each other both on the board and in life

coaches.title: Coaches
coaches.1desc: An experienced coach who can find an approach to any situation
coaches.2desc: A veteran who will help you find balance and recover both mentally and physically

location.title: Location
location.warning: May be closed in bad weather — call
